title: Pony Metal U-GAIM Promotion Film
synopsis: This is a short little pilot film inserting Yuu Morisawa, the heroine of Creamy Mami, into the mecha world of Heavy Metal L-Gaim.
staff: [['Okiura, Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']], ['Kitakubo, Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']], ['Yoshida, Tooru', ['Key Animation', ' Mechanical Design']], ['Osaka, Hiroshi', ['Key Animation']]]
